fileheader.author: Aeromatic based mod Gerard Robin, some ideas were taken from Concorde
fileheader.note:
This model was created using publicly available data, publicly available technical reports, textbooks, and guesses. It contains no proprietary or restricted data. It has been validated only to the extent that it seems to "fly right", and possibly to comply to published, publicly known, performance data (maximum speed, endurance, etc.). Thus, this model is meant for educational and entertainment purposes only.
This simulation model is not endorsed by the manufacturer.
fileheader.documentation: Manufacturer: Lockheed Aircraft Corporation Length:107' 5" Length of Nose Probe:4' 11" Wing Span:55' 7" Wing Area:1,795 ft. sq. Wing Aspect Ratio:1.939 Wing Root Chord:60.533 Wing Dihedral Angle:0 degrees Wing Chord:0.00 Wing Sweep:52.629 degrees Inboard Elevon Area:39.00 ft. sq. Outboard Elevon Area:52.50 ft. sq. Total Vertical Rudder Area:150.76 ft. sq. Moveable Rudder Area:70.24 ft. sq. Rudder Root Chord:14.803 ft. Rudder Tip Chord:7.833 ft. Height:18' 6" Empty Weight:59,000 lbs. Maximum Weight:170,000 lbs. Fuselage Diameter:5.33 ft. Service Ceiling:85,000'+ Maximum Speed:Mach 3.3+ (Limit CIT of 427 degrees C) Cruising Speed:Mach 3.2 Engines:2 Pratt Whittney J-58 (JT11D-20A) with 34,000 lbs. of thrust. Range:3,200 nautical miles without refueling ======================== Takeoff weight 120000 lbs Rotation speed 180 Kn Refusal speddw/chute 180 Kn Takeoff speed 210 Kn Ground run 4800 ft distance 3000 ft litoff 50 feets and 5500 ft litoff 200 feets S.E. Speed (Out of GE) gear up 226 Kn ======================== Landing w/chute immediately after takeoff weight 116.000 lbs Distance 5250 ft Final speed 221 Kn Land speed 191 Kn ========================= Landing weight 80.000 lbs Distance 9650 ft (RCR=14) rwy wet Distance 4000 ft W/chute (RCR=23) rwy dry Final speed 175 Kn Land speed 155 Kn ========================= other data => takeoff speed is scheduled according to gross weight correspond to a lift coef of 0.60. distance 3000 litoff 50 feets and 5500 litoff 200 landing brakes are applied at 120 kias Current speed operating limit 500 keas Current speed operating 450 keas

axis.name: DRAG
axis.documentation: tricky solution=> 4.5 mach column only to limit the speed , the model, must not be able to go over
